title: PULSE: Deterministic Release Gates for Safe & Useful AI
description: This preprint describes PULSE, a deterministic, fail‑closed system of release gates for ensuring AI systems are safe and useful. It introduces safety invariants across multiple dimensions (I₀–I₇), utility metrics (Q₁–Q₄) and service level objectives (SLO). The paper motivates the need for release gates and provides theoretical foundations as well as case studies.
notes: This preprint accompanies the PULSE software package and provides the theoretical foundations and empirical case studies.
